DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the performance of two daily disposable contact lenses in a population of neophytes (new wearers).
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of Two Daily Disposable Lenses in Neophytes
DOC.criteria: No previous contact lens experience or attempts to try contact lenses (neophytes). Currently wearing spectacles or needing vision correction in both eyes. No older than 45 years of age. Able to achieve visual acuity of at least 20/40 in each eye with study lenses in the available parameters. Interested in wearing contact lenses. Willing to wear study lenses for at least 8 hours/day, at least 5 days/week. Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply. Eye injury or surgery within twelve weeks prior to enrollment. Preexisting ocular irritation that would preclude contact lens fitting. Previous corneal or refractive surgery. Currently enrolled in any Clinical Trial. Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
